quote: It was impossible to get the Dimitri and Tasha thing out of my head, but at least packing and getting ready made sure I didn't devote 100 percent of my brain power to him. More like 95 percent.
quote_letters: IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO GET THE DIMITRI AND TASHA THING OUT OF MY HEAD BUT AT LEAST PACKING AND GETTING READY MADE SURE I DIDNT DEVOTE '1''0''0' PERCENT OF MY BRAIN POWER TO HIM MORE LIKE '9''5' PERCENT
